name: Create a new record in a table in Airtable from a new content in Drupal
description:
This template regularly checks for new content in Drupal and uses the retrieved information to create new records in Drupal. 

The template expects your Airtable table to have these fields.
1) title 
2) type
3) content id
4) links>self>href
5) drupal internal nid
6) drupal internal vid
7) promote
8) sticky
 To keep things simple, it's ok if they are all set as "short line text". 

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking on the clock icon on the first module.
